gene.function: FUNCTION: Acts as an important p53/TP53-apoptotic effector. Regulates TNF-alpha-mediated apoptosis in a p53/TP53-dependent manner. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17599062}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Late endosome membrane {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27582497}; Peripheral membrane protein {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27582497}; Cytoplasmic side {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27582497}. Lysosome membrane {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27582497}; Peripheral membrane protein {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27582497}; Cytoplasmic side {ECO:0000269|PubMed:27582497}.
geneOntologyCellularComponent: cytoplasmic side of late endosome membrane [GO:0098560]
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: intrinsic apoptotic signaling pathway in response to DNA damage by p53 class mediator [GO:0042771]
